metadata.synopsis: Investigating the plaque on a coffin in the Open Hand Temple crypt. One of the monks is buried here.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/BGO_Main_A- Use ReCon command "oe SAM_Crypt"- Interact with S_WYR_SentientAmulet_Tomb_Plaque_001_1e5e7950-6908-492a-93c4-856c04c83368
